DOC.brief_summary: Aims of study 1. Effect of daily weight change upto 7 days from ICU admission to outcome of treatment in 28 days 2. Determination cut point of maximum weight change to outcome treatment
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Body Weight Change to Surgical ICU Outcomes
DOC.detailed_description: Study type : Prospective observational study Location : General surgical intensive care unit Inclusion criteria : All admission patient with expected survive more than 24 hours Exclusion criteria : Patient died within 24 hours or who could not be weighed.
DOC.criteria: All admitted ICU patients expected survive more than 24 hours All expected ICU patients survive less than 24 hours All patient cannot be weighed.
